data.text:
Deron Williams is an All-Star NBA point guard who was born on June 26, 1984 in Parkersburg, WV. He began his professional career with the Utah Jazz in 2005 and was traded to the New Jersey Nets in 2011. Williams has achieved great success in his career, including two Olympic gold medals with Team USA at the 2008 and 2012 games.

Deron Williams is a member of Basketball Player

Age, Biography and Wiki

ð° Net worth: $21.3 Million (2024)

Deron Williams, renowned for his skills as a professional basketball player, is expected to have a net worth of approximately $21.3 million in the year 2024. Hailing from West Virginia, Williams has carved out a successful career in the sport, amassing a significant fortune through his exceptional talent and dedication to the game. As an influential figure in the world of basketball, his net worth stands as a testament to his accomplishments and the impact he has made in the sport.

About

All-Star NBA point guard who began his career with the Utah Jazz in 2005 and was traded to the New Jersey Nets in 2011. He won two Olympic gold medals with Team USA at the 2008 and 2012 games.

Before Fame

He was a star point guard at the University of Illinois, leading the team to the 2005 National Championship game, where they were defeated by North Carolina.

Trivia

He became the cornerstone of the new-look Brooklyn Nets in 2012 after signing a five-year contract valued at almost $100 million. However, he was bought out three years later and signed with the Dallas Mavericks in 2015.

Family Life

He married Amy Young Williams. The couple has two daughters, Daija and Denae, and two sons, Deron Jr. (DJ) and Desmond. DJ was diagnosed with autism at 18 months old and the elder Deron has since worked with Autism Speaks.

Associated With

He chose to re-sign with the Nets under the guidance of part-owner Jay Z.
